perturbation.original_text:
8.1     Term  of  Agreement.  This  Agreement  shall  be effective upon the
             -------------------
Effective Date and shall remain in force for a period of one (1) year, and shall
be automatically renewed for successive periods of one (1) year unless otherwise
terminated  as provided  herein.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1     Term  of  Agreement.  This  Agreement  shall  be effective upon the
             -------------------
Effective Date and shall remain in force for a period of one (1) year, and may be renewed for successive periods of one (1) year based on the discretion of NETTAXI, and unless otherwise terminated as provided herein.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the agreement is automatically renewed. The modified text changes this to renewal based on NETTAXI's discretion, contradicting the automatic renewal clause and creating uncertainty about the agreement's duration.

perturbation.original_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions
(CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising
Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be
responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except
taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI up to fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions
(CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising
Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be
responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except
taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income. The exact percentage will be determined by NETTAXI based on their assessment of SpinRecords.com's performance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets a fixed rate of 50% of ad revenue payable to NETTAXI. The modified text changes 'fifty (50%) percent' to 'up to fifty (50%) percent' and adds a clause that the exact percentage will be determined by NETTAXI based on SpinRecords.com's performance. This introduces a contradiction as it's unclear how much will exactly be paid, making enforcement uncertain.

perturbation.original_text:
3.1     Licenses  by  NETTAXI  to SpinRecords.com. NETTAXI hereby grants to
             -----------------------------------------
SpinRecords.com  a non-exclusive, worldwide, nontransferable, revocable, royalty
free  license to use the NETTAXI Brand Features as the same may be modified from
time  to  time  for  the  purposes  of  this  Agreement
perturbation.changed_text:
3.1     Licenses  by  NETTAXI  to SpinRecords.com. NETTAXI hereby grants to
             -----------------------------------------
SpinRecords.com  a non-exclusive license to use the NETTAXI Brand Features as the same may be modified from
time  to  time  for  the  purposes  of  this  Agreement. This license is worldwide, but may be transferred, and is not revocable or royalty-free.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants a non-exclusive, worldwide, nontransferable, revocable, royalty-free license. The modified text directly contradicts the original terms making the license transferrable, not revocable and no longer royalty-free, creating direct conflict and uncertainty about the nature of the license granted.
